title: Portable Mixer, "Model 10M47", ca. 1955
dimensions:
Parts a/c assembled: 24.5 h x 22 w x 9 d cm (9 5/8 x 8 11/16 x 3 9/16 in.); 
Individual parts:
a: (body) 11.5 h x 22 w x 9 d cm (4 1/2 h x 8 11/16 w x 3 9/16 in.)
b,c: (beaters) 18.5 L x 5.2 Di  cm ( 7 1/2 L x 2 1/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
description: Salmon-colored portable mixer (a) with metal plate under handle, on/off switch and speed control at side and top of handle; white underside with two circular openings at front to receive removeable metal beaters (b,c).

tombstone.epitaph:
Portable Mixer, "Model 10M47", ca. 1955.
ca. 1955. Plastic, metal. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund. 1993-150-26-a/d.
